page.title: 09PRIORY PRIMARY SCHOOL,1.
page.content: {Headmistresses-}Miss Holliday(1939), Miss Price(1957) Mrs Murphy(1963), Mrs Owen(1976, onwards) Facilities- 1 Resources Room, 1 Reading Room, Dining Room, Hall, Garden, Playing Fields. Choosing- Every Wednesday parents come in to help with cookery(Admission Class only) Crafts, also to help repair and decorate. Gardening and help in the class- rooms. {Life in the school today.} Children from estates surrounding the school attend from the age of five or just under at the beginning of each school year in September. Three mornings a week there is an assembly. The assembly on Wednesday is a class assembly. Each class has two P.E. lessons a week. The admission class have cooking lessons and all classes watch educational television programmes.
